DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the use of unrelated donors for hematopoietic cell transplantation in the treatment of hematologic and lymphoid malignancies.
DOC.brief_title: Stem Cell Transplant From Matched Unrelated or Partially Matched Related Donors
DOC.detailed_description: Stem Cell Transplantation from Matched Unrelated or Partially Matched Related Donors Using a Preparatory Regimen Consisting of Fractionated Total Body Irradiation (FTBI) and Cyclophosphamide (CY). To administer high dose radio-chemotherapy followed by stem cell transplantation from a matched unrelated donor or a partially matched related donor.
DOC.criteria: acute leukemia chronic leukemia lymphoblastic lymphoma MDS MPS organ dysfunction HIV positive
